title: Key West Concert and Music Festival Scene

more_content:
Key West has been on the music map for years, and now we’ve got more entertainment news to brag about! In addition to hearing live bands and music across the island, we now have an Amphitheater and Event Lawn experience for music festivals and concert-going travelers. Best news of all is the lineup of artists heading to paradise is off the charts.

About the Live Music Venues

Rams Head Presents Live Music Venues and Concerts: Key West Theater, Sunset Green Event Lawn and the Coffee Butler Amphitheater. 

Photo Credit: Rams Head Presents Facebook Page: Slightly Stoopid 2018 Performance at the Key West Amphitheater

THE COFFEE BUTLER KEY WEST AMPHITHEATER

Located at the new Truman Waterfront, the Coffee Butler Amphitheater is situated near Fort Zachary Taylor with stunning views of the Gulf of Mexico. You’ll experience more than a great concert as from the top of the lawn - you’ll be able to experience our world-famous Key West Sunset on show day! With a grassy general admission lawn, intimate reserved seats, and a one of a kind panoramic backdrop, the Amphitheater provides the perfect entertainment space for all music fans. One of our favorite music venues in Key West.

The Coffee Butler Amphitheater is located at 21 East Quay Rd, Key West, FL 33040

SUNSET GREEN EVENT LAWN

Sunset Green Event Lawn is a multipurpose event space located between 24 North Hotel and The Gates Hotel. So many great concerts have already taken place at this venue. The Beach Boys, Michael McDonald, and the epic Michael Franti and Spearhead concert were held at this concert venue, and the upcoming concert list of entertainment is off the charts. Sunset Green Event Lawn is surrounded by luxurious pools and lush greenery, offering an ultimate escape to indulge in the Key West lifestyle and casual island vibe. With food, drinks, and state-of-the-art sound and production, Sunset Green provides the ultimate concert experience!

Sunset Green Event Lawn is located at 3820 North Roosevelt Blvd, Key West, Florida
33040

KEY WEST THEATER

The Key West Theater is a 278 seat venue located in the heart of Old Town, just one block from Duval Street. Guests will enjoy this unique, intimate setting inside a historic building that was once the 1st Baptist Church of Key West.

 

Johnnyswim at The Key West Theater

The Key West Theater is setting the stage for a night filled top tier music, concerts, theatrical productions, comedy & variety specials and locally produced Key West events. View the Key West Theater schedule of events to find out what shows are coming up. Key West Theater is located at 512 Eaton Street, Key West, FL 33040

Upcoming Concerts & Shows

 

Kool & The Gang and The Village People, Coffee Butler Amphitheater, February 21, 2020
The Kingston Trio at The Key West Theater, March 10th
The Temptations, Sunset Green Event Lawn, April 5
Mary Chapin Carpenter & Shawn Colvin at the Sunset Green Event Lawn, April 4th
38 Special at The Sunset Green Event Lawn, April 10th
The Mavericks, Sunset Green Lawn, May 31st

There’s so much more….

How To Stay Informed on Upcoming Key West Concerts & Events

Rams Head Presents new events and concerts daily and we don’t want you to miss out on any of it! Another bit of advice - tickets sell out fast. To stay updated make sure to visit the Key West Concerts and Event Schedule.

25th Annual Key West Songwriters Festival May 6 - 10, 2020

150 great artists, 50+ FREE shows, 5 days & 30 stages

2019 Key West Songwriters Festival Main Stage Duval Street Concert featuring Brad Paisley and Ryan Hurd

The Key West Songwriters Festival - the largest festival of its kind in the world. Since 1997 BMI has been a presenting sponsor of the festival and has helped it grow into both a tourist attraction and favorite of island locals. The festival revolves around five days and nights, where live music bliss introduces crowds to the faces, voices, and stories behind the songs!

 

Adam James and Ryan Beaver perform at Blue Heaven restaurant. Photo Credit Key West Songwriters Festival

The 2020 Lineup has not been announced so make sure to follow the Key West Songwriters Festival Social Media Accounts or signup to receive updates by visiting the Key West Songwriters Festival Website

Music and more at The Marker!

We will have pool parties with live music at our Key West Waterfront Resort throughout the year and during major festivals and events. Stay updated on what’s happening during your stay by following us on Facebook and Instagram.

Live Music All Around Town

There’s no shortage of live music and entertainment in Key West. It’s everywhere! Check out a few of our favorites and the best places for live music in Key West.

Now that we’ve set the stage and given you some insight on live music, concerts, and festival venues, grab your tickets and enjoy the show! #lovethemarker
